repeat_loop_K_2.tooltip: Repeat the action a specified number of times.

1.name: bookSorting4_1
1.instructions: Sort out all the books by putting non-fiction and fiction books together
1.hints: Use the if block to let the computer decide what book is fiction

1.name: gymMayhem3_1
1.instructions: Clean up all the rackets by using an event block and its action
1.hints: Use the event block to activate the right arrow key on your keyboard and add the action right. The player will react on the right key by going to the right side.
